verses.text: These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w*, \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w Anathoth|strong="H6068"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* territory \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amon \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* through \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w went|strong="H3063"\w* \w into|strong="H1540"\w* \w exile|strong="H1540"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*:

“\w Before|strong="H2962"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w were|strong="H5030"\w* \w born|strong="H3318"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w apart|strong="H6942"\w* \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.”

“Ah, \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*: “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*.’ \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* must \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* must \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w reached|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w touched|strong="H5060"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*: “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w uproot|strong="H5428"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w tear|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w destroy|strong="H5422"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w overthrow|strong="H2040"\w*, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w plant|strong="H5193"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*, asking, “\w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* branch \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w almond|strong="H8247"\w* \w tree|strong="H8247"\w*,” \w I|strong="H1697"\w* replied.

“\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w observed|strong="H6213"\w* \w correctly|strong="H3190"\w*,” \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w watching|strong="H8245"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w Again|strong="H8145"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, asking, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w boiling|strong="H5301"\w* \w pot|strong="H5518"\w*,” \w I|strong="H1697"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* tilting \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w Disaster|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* poured \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w summon|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w Their|strong="H3605"\w* kings \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w thrones|strong="H3678"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* attack \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w pronounce|strong="H1696"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w Me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* gods \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w worshiped|strong="H7812"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Get|strong="H6965"\w* yourself ready. \w Stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Do|strong="H6680"\w* \w not|strong="H6435"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* intimidated \w by|strong="H6965"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w or|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w will|strong="H2865"\w* \w terrify|strong="H2865"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w this|strong="H5414"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H2346"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fortified|strong="H4013"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* land—\w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w overcome|strong="H3201"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*,” \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
